exprience.article: I learned about JAVA Core and the OOP concepts. I have been involved in developing a few projects using Java J2EE, JSP, Servlet, JDBC, JSTL during the learning process. The database when I work with JAVA I used SQL Server.

projects.title: Project - Graduation
responsible: Write API for production planning feature and a few other functions such as: login, logout, send email, upload file & image, read file pdf, etc.
Develop the web interface and call the api from the server to get the data and present it to the front-end.
decription: The manager relies on the plan to import more materials and create production batch. The system will send an email to the staff to weigh the raw materials to be shipped, packaged and finish production process. This includes some features:
